Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 30th overall pick, by Kansas City in 2006...
Injured on 6/7/2006 with a Broken Finger, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 7/23/2009 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 9/8/2009, off Nelson Cruz (NYA)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/11/2009, off John Thomson (NYA)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against New York (A) on 6/12/2011...
Was selected to the 2011 Allstar game...
Had 6 hits with 5 RBI against New York (N) on 7/23/2011...
Had 6 hits with 3 RBI against Boston on 8/26/2011...
Drove in 6 runs against Colorado on 6/8/2013...
Injured on 6/29/2013 with a Fractured Knee, out for 7 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/6/2013, hitting .458 with 0 HR, 7 RBI...
Injured on 5/5/2014 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 4 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Tampa Bay on 9/27/2015...
Released by Kansas City on 9/1/2019...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 9/1/2019 to a 1-year deal worth $2,140,000 per year...
Traded from Philadelphia to New York (A) on 5/29/2021 (Going to NYA: LF J. Jay. Going to PHI: P V. Doerr)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 2022...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Boston on 4/6/2023...
